player

Interface IInventory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Inventory

    public interface IInventory
    An inventory of items is carried by a player. The inventory cannot hold more then a maximum number of items.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(IItem item)
      This method adds a given item to this inventory.
      java.util.List<IItem> getItems()
      Returns a list of the stored items.
      int getMaxNumberOfItems()
      Returns the maximum number of items this inventory can hold.
      void removeItem(IItem item)
      Remove an item for this inventory.

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        void addItem(IItem item)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method adds a given item to this inventory.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be added to the inventory
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The inventory can hold a max of getMaxNumberOfItems() items.

      • removeItem

        Remove an item for this inventory.
        Parameters:
